description: Rarely Available – a serene, park-like corner home offering fully renovated living in one of Port Moody’s most sought-after family communities. The main floor is ideal for entertaining, with morning light in the kitchen and private terrace, plus a south-facing balcony filling the living room with afternoon sun. Features include A/C, gas fireplace, custom built-ins, and extensive millwork. The dream kitchen boasts quartz counters, an oversized island, and custom cabinetry. Upstairs has 3 bedrooms and 2 baths, including a primary retreat with walk-in closet and spa-inspired ensuite. Downstairs, a large 4th bedroom with ensuite provides flexible space for guests, media, or rec room. 2-car heated garage, EV-ready. Easy access to schools, parks, trails, transit, this is the complete package!
